briefTitle: Oleogel-S10 Versus Standard of Care in Healing of Grade 2a Burn Wounds
officialTitle: Open, Blindly Evaluated, Prospective, Controlled, Randomized, Multicenter Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare Intra-individually the Efficacy and Tolerance of Oleogel-S10 Versus Standard of Care in Accelerating the Healing of Grade 2a Partial-Thickness Burn Wounds
summary: The main goal of this phase III clinical trial is to show safety and efficacy of Oleogel-S10 in the acceleration of wound healing of grade 2a burn wounds.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Earlier Healing of the Wound Half Treated With Oleogel-S10 Compared to the Wound Half Receiving Standard of Care
